EmailTemplate.subject: Discover how a new LAN is saving money for organizations around the world
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Switch to Passive Optical LAN to cut costs and boost performance A new local area network solution is bringing significant increases in performance – and significant cost savings – to organizations around the world. Discover why Environment Canterbury of New Zealand decided to bring their LAN up to light speed by switching to Nokia Passive Optical LAN. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
